TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Attribute extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._Attribute

summary.span: 表示自定义特性的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将将与目标元素相关联的预定义的系统信息或用户定义的自定义信息。The class associates predefined system information or user-defined custom information with a target element. 目标元素可以是程序集、 类、 构造函数、 委托、 枚举、 事件、 字段、 接口、 方法、 可移植可执行文件的模块、 参数、 属性、 返回值、 结构或另一个属性。A target element can be an assembly, class, constructor, delegate, enum, event, field, interface, method, portable executable file module, parameter, property, return value, struct, or another attribute. 所提供的属性信息也称为是元数据。Information provided by an attribute is also known as metadata. 元数据可以由你的应用程序来控制应用程序如何处理数据，检查在运行时或之前运行时由外部工具来控制如何在应用程序本身进行处理或维护。Metadata can be examined at run time by your application to control how your program processes data, or before run time by external tools to control how your application itself is processed or maintained. 例如，.NET Framework 预定义和使用属性类型来控制运行时行为，而某些编程语言使用属性类型以表示不直接支持的.NET Framework 通用类型系统的语言功能。For example, the .NET Framework predefines and uses attribute types to control run-time behavior, and some programming languages use attribute types to represent language features not directly supported by the .NET Framework common type system. 所有属性类型都都直接或间接从类。All attribute types derive directly or indirectly from the class. 特性可以应用于任何目标元素;多个属性可应用到相同的目标元素;并可以由派生自目标元素的元素继承属性。Attributes can be applied to any target element; multiple attributes can be applied to the same target element; and attributes can be inherited by an element derived from a target element. 使用类，以指定特性应用于的目标元素。Use the class to specify the target element to which the attribute is applied. 类提供了便捷方法，以检索和测试自定义属性。The class provides convenient methods to retrieve and test custom attributes. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[应用特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md)并[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Applying Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/applying-attributes.md) and [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的使用情况。The following code example demonstrates the usage of . [!code-cpp[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/CPP/customattribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/CS/customattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AnimalAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AnimalAttributes/VB/customattribute.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用反射来检索当前实例的字段信息和`obj`参数。The method uses reflection to retrieve field information for the current instance and the `obj` argument. 它然后将字段值进行比较。It then compares field values. 当实现您自己的类派生自，可以重写方法。When implementing your own class derived from , you can override the method. 因为它使用反射，我们建议您这样做。Because it uses reflection, we recommend that you do so. 但是，重写应执行标准测试引用相等性 （两个参数表示相同的对象实例） 或 （两个参数的相同类型且具有相同的字段值） 的值相等性。However, your override should perform a standard test for reference equality (the two arguments represent the same object instance) or value equality (the two arguments are of the same type and have identical field values). 如果你想要执行自定义比较确定两个属性对象是否相等，则您可以重写方法。If you want to perform a custom comparison to determine whether two attributes objects are equal, you can override the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义两个自定义参数类，然后创建多个对象的每个类，并使用方法来对它们进行比较。The following example defines two custom parameter classes, then creates several objects of each class and uses the method to compare them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的默认实现返回`false`，且必须在要对此类非常有用的派生类中实现。The default implementation of this class returns `false`, and must be implemented in the derived class to be useful to that class. 此方法在派生的类进行比较实现的值的此实例与标准默认值，然后返回一个布尔值，该值指示此实例的值是否相等的标准值。The implementation of this method in a derived class compares the value of this instance to a standard default value, then returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the value of this instance is equal to the standard value. 标准值通常是编码为一个常量在实现中，或以编程方式存储在由实现使用的字段。The standard value is typically coded as a constant in the implementation, or stored programmatically in a field used by the implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用。The following code example illustrates the use of . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法确定一个等于另一个。This method determines if one equals another. 其默认实现是相同，用于确定是否两个属性均属于同一类型，具有相同的字段值。Its default implementation is the same as , which determines whether two attributes are of the same type and have the same field values. 一般情况下，方法旨在执行标准测试引用或值是否相等。In general, the method is intended to perform a standard test for reference or value equality. 您可以重写方法时您想要执行的自定义比较基于某些条件不是两个特性实例是否相等的相同类型且具有 identifical 的值。You can override the method when you want to perform a custom comparison for equality that is based on some criteria other than that two attribute instances are of the same type and have identifical values. 例如，您可以重写方法来比较以下方案中的属性：For example, you can override the method to compare attributes in the following scenarios: - 属性包含一个位字段，并且考虑两个特性实例等于是否设置了特定的位。An attribute includes a bit field, and you consider two attribute instances equal if a particular bit is set. 例如，`NumericDisplay`属性可能包括指示哪些数字格式 （例如二进制、 八进制、 十进制和十六进制） 客户端支持的位字段。For example, a `NumericDisplay` attribute might include a bit field that indicates what numeric formats (such as binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal) a client supports. 重写方法可能会考虑两个实例相等，是否它们支持相同的数字格式。The overridden method might consider two instances equal if they support the same numeric format. - 属性包含多个字段包含相同类型的信息，或者它包含的数组中的值可以按任意顺序。An attribute includes multiple fields that contain the same kind of information, or it contains an array in which values can be in any order. 例如，`Author`属性可能包含多个字段，作者姓名。For example, an `Author` attribute might include multiple fields for author names. 重写方法可能会考虑两个实例相等，是否它们具有同一作者不考虑每个字段是否等于对应的字段。The overridden method might consider two instances equal if they have the same authors regardless of whether each field is equal to the corresponding field. ## 示例Example 下面的示例演示如何使用创建属性值的自定义比较方法。The following example illustrates the use of to create a custom comparison method for attribute values. 如果定义了`AuthorsAttribute`在内部包含`List`存储作者的名称。If defines an `AuthorsAttribute` that internally contains a `List` that stores authors' names. 名称可以在列表中的任何顺序出现，因为它将替代方法来比较作者姓名，而不考虑其在列表中的位置。Because the names can occur in any order in the list, it overrides the method to compare author names regardless of their position in the list. 请注意方法，用于执行测试的值是否相等，返回不同的结果从方法。Note the method, which performs a test for value equality, returns different results from the method. [!code-csharp[Match#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Match/CS/match.cs)] [!code-vb[Match#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Match/VB/match.vb)]
